title: LF mature individual to join our team
body:
we are currently a bronze 5 team of inexperienced friends looking for a mature player to join our ranks.  
While we play for fun, we aim to try and improve our play as a team and progress up the ladder systematically. 
You must be a friendly, mature and team-based individual ( not a rager) who is looking to join a team for the purpose of camaraderie and progression with a likeminded group.  Reply with your name or message either : beneamata or huliojordio in game.

replies.body: Hey guys, My IGN is Captain Mongoose and Im down to join a team, honestly the attitude seems the best thing about this one so that won me over :)
